greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 13*n^2 - 16*n + 5.
comment: Numbers of the form (rn-r+1)^2+((r+1)n-r)^2; in this case, r=2.
Inverse binomial transform of this sequence: 5,-3, 26, 0, 0 (0 continued).
link: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: a(n) = 3*a(n-1) - 3*a(n-2) + a(n-3) for n > 2. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 09 2017
results.author: _Bruno Berselli_, Dec 12 2011
